snippet: The longtime editor, who was moved out in 2010, returns to a newsroom shaken by layoffs and changes in ownership.
abstract: The longtime editor, who was moved out in 2010, returns to a newsroom shaken by layoffs and changes in ownership.

byline.original: By DAVID CARR and AMY CHOZICK

headline.main: Marimow to Return as Editor of Philadelphia Inquirer
headline.print_headline: Former Editor of Philadelphia Inquirer Is to Return to the Newspaper in the Same Role
